name: Screw Vis
description:
It's a morning in the workshop and you are a screw.

Roll around the room like you have no purpose in life and gather other mechanical parts to forget your meaningless existence and try to have what's look like "fun" if you weren't a emotionless object.

A game developped on Unreal Engine 4 during the Ludume Dare 45

Guillaume Alves - ProgrammerDamien Drouillard - Sound Designer
Victoria Grunberg - Game Designer - 2D ArtistAgathe Loubière - 3D ArtistHorace Ribout - Programmer
